titleStmt.title: Mr. William Wheelers case from his own relation
titleStmt.author: Wheeler, William, 17th cent.
Parker, Henry, 1604-1652.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Henry Parker. Cf. Wing and Halkett and Laing.
Also attributed to William Wheeler, Civil engineer. Cf. BM.
MS. note by Thomason: "By Hen. Parker, Esquire."
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
